messages.message: @Hamish for point #4, will the validation criteria be class-specific? e.g. set for only Passports, or would it apply to all documents?

I think for this customer its across all documents. I can imagine scenarios where it might be class specific though e.g. they also receive lease agreements which will almost always be black and white pdfs for example
Btw this customer has asked if thereâ€™s is anything we can show around image quality/black or white detection at the POC readout. Do we have anything similar that I can show here?
cc @Rakesh on image quality / black-or-white detection?
